en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.end: Finally free, thank you for helping me getting out of the castle!
en.intro_1: Locked up in this place for so many years... Finally I can get out of this place, I just have to defeat the 12 guardians and I will be free.
en.intro_2: Every door will take me to a guardian that I have to defeat.
en.killBoss6: I have defeated half of the guardians, soon I will escape.
en.killBoss12: I have defeated all the guardians, I am finally free.
en.enterLastBoss: I though this door was the way out, but it looks like there are a final guardian waiting for me, this will be a really hard fight.
en.killLastBoss: The way out! I can see it, it's my chance to get out of here.

es.end: ¡Finalmente libre, Gracias por ayudarme a salir del castillo!
es.intro_1: Encerrado en este castillo por años... Al fin podre salir de este lugar, solo debo vencer a los 12 guardianes y podre salir.
es.intro_2: Cada puerta me llevara hacia un guardian, que debere derrotar.
es.killBoss6: He terminado con la mitad de los guardianes, pronto podre escapar
es.killBoss12: He derrotado a todos los guardianes, al fin soy libre
es.enterLastBoss: Crei que era la salida, pero parece que hay un ultimo guardian esperando, sera una dura batalla
es.killLastBoss: La salida, veo la salida, es mi momento de escapar de aqui.

jp.readyToPlay: あなたは遊ぶ準備ができていますか？
jp.pressContinue: 続行するには '次へ'ボタンを押してください。
